issues.description: The UML in the problem statement and the solution implementation define a method named addToStockIngredients(StockIngredient) for the Stock class, but the template repository uses addItem(StockIngredient) instead. This naming mismatch may confuse students when mapping the required method from the diagram to the starter code and reference solution.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the templateâ€™s addItem(StockIngredient) method to addToStockIngredients(StockIngredient) (or add a forwarding method with that name) so that it matches the UML and the solution implementation.
